Name: Zoning, 14-10 Beach Channel Drive Rezoning, Queens (N 240080 ZRQ).
Title: Application number N 240080 ZRQ (14-10 Beach Channel Drive Rezoning) submitted by 14-10 Beach LLC, pursuant to Section 201 of the New York City Charter, for an amendment of the Zoning Resolution of the City of New York, modifying APPENDIX F for the purpose of establishing a Mandatory Inclusionary Housing area, Borough of Queens, Community District 14, Council District 31.

History.Description: This Land Use Application was Introduced by Council
